Background:

An energetic and determined individual. I have the ability to work alone as well as with a team. A recent graduate from UMASS Amherst, I have earned my Bachelors degree in English. I have a keen eye for detail, strong wordplay, and am looking to further augment my analytical strengths. I have studied and analyzed various forms of writing; from Shakespeare to poems, to modern fiction. To complement my writing studies, I've also studied art and animation, which leads to a strong creative background.
